text: Miss Pameela is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thevalakkara Chellappan, starring Thyagarajan and Silk Smitha in the lead roles. http://www.metromatinee.com/MovieStills/Miss%20Pamela-1031-1 ==Cast== * Silk Smitha as Pameela * Thiagarajan as Victor *Suresh Gopi as Ranji * Innocent as Satto * Vijayaraghavan as Rajamani *Captain Raju as SI Rajan Philippose *Jagannatha Varma as Pameela's father *Kollam Ajith as Hamsa *Lalu Alex as Psychiatrist *James as SI James *Jayarekha ==Soundtrack== Music was composed by Vidyadharan. {| class="wikitable" !# !Song !Singer !Lyricist |- |1 |"Kandaalo kannu thattum" |MG Sreekumar |RK Damodaran |- |2 |"Pulakangal viriyunna" |KS Chithra |Poovachal Khader |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Thevalakkara Chellappan
title: Miss Pameela
